name: Alchemist
description: A locale steeped in arcane or spiritual power; adventurers may study spells, brew potions, or face eldritch hazards.
atmosphere: The air is thick with the scent of exotic chemicals, herbs, and the metallic tang of alchemical reactions. Strange bubbling sounds and the hiss of steam fill the air, while colorful liquids bubble in glass vessels. The atmosphere crackles with arcane energy and the promise of magical discoveries.
